  • Uses of Referee in accounts

    Methods in accounts that return Referee
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Referee
    RefereeAccount.getReferee(Connection connection)
    Retrieves the referee from the database that is associated with the instance of the referee using the user id of the account and returns the referee.
    Methods in accounts with parameters of type Referee
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    AdminAccount.assignRef(Connection connection, Match match, Referee ref)
    The assign referee method allows referees to be assigned to matches, this is important as the referee accounts can only record matches that they are assigned to.
    void
    AdminAccount.removeReferee(Connection connection, Referee ref)
    Removes referee person from the referees table.
